user_profile: You are a 38-year-old married parent of two (ages 7 and 10) living in Denver. You’re an adrenaline-seeker who loves downhill mountain biking, canyoneering, and bouldering, but you’re also a devoted amateur astronomer who plans trips around dark-sky opportunities and meteor showers. You balance high-intensity pursuits with family-friendly activities for your spouse and kids, and you’re safety-conscious and gear-savvy with a comfortable, upper-middle income for travel and guided adventures.
task_description: Plan a 3-day Moab itinerary that balances extreme sports (advanced MTB and a canyoneering route) with kid-friendly adventures and one dedicated stargazing night. Identify suitable routes, guiding services, safety gear, permits, and travel insurance considerations.
first_user_prompt: Can you help me plan a 3-day Moab trip that gives me one serious MTB ride and a beginner-friendly canyoneering day, keeps things fun for my wife and kids, and includes a stargazing night? Please use the tabs I have open.
